description: DJ Genre metadata including typical BPM ranges, energy characteristics, and mixing guidelines

genres.name: Tech House
genres.description: Groovy, hypnotic house music with techno influences
genres.mixingTips: Focus on groove and rhythm matching. Works well with gradual energy builds.

genres.name: Deep House
genres.description: Soulful, atmospheric house with deep basslines and jazzy elements
genres.mixingTips: Emphasize smooth transitions and harmonic mixing. Great for opening sets.

genres.name: Techno
genres.description: Driving, repetitive electronic music with industrial influences
genres.mixingTips: Long blends work well. Focus on energy progression and tension building.

genres.name: House
genres.description: Classic four-on-the-floor dance music with soulful and funky elements
genres.mixingTips: Versatile genre. Works with most house subgenres. Focus on energy matching.

genres.name: Progressive House
genres.description: Melodic, atmospheric house with long buildups and emotional breakdowns
genres.mixingTips: Allow tracks to develop. Long mixes work best. Focus on melodic compatibility.

genres.name: Melodic Techno
genres.description: Emotional techno with strong melodic elements and atmospheric pads
genres.mixingTips: Focus on harmonic mixing and emotional flow. Great for peak moments.

genres.name: Afro House
genres.description: African-influenced house with tribal percussion and organic sounds
genres.mixingTips: Emphasize percussion and rhythm. Works well with organic, earthy vibes.

genres.name: Minimal
genres.description: Stripped-back electronic music focusing on subtle changes and groove
genres.mixingTips: Focus on groove and subtle transitions. Less is more.

genres.name: Bass House
genres.description: High-energy house with heavy, distorted basslines and festival vibes
genres.mixingTips: Energy is key. Quick transitions work well. Focus on drop timing.

genres.name: Electro House
genres.description: Energetic house with electro influences and big room sound
genres.mixingTips: Focus on energy peaks and drops. Works well in peak time sets.

genres.name: Trance
genres.description: Uplifting, melodic electronic music with emotional buildups and breakdowns
genres.mixingTips: Long mixes essential. Focus on energy flow and emotional journey.

genres.name: Drum & Bass
genres.description: Fast-paced breakbeat music with heavy bass and complex drum patterns
genres.mixingTips: Precise beatmatching crucial. Focus on bass and drum patterns.

genres.name: Dubstep
genres.description: Bass-heavy electronic music with wobbles and half-time rhythms
genres.mixingTips: Focus on drop timing and bass energy. Works well with dramatic transitions.

genres.name: Disco
genres.description: Funky, groovy dance music from the 70s with modern edits and remixes
genres.mixingTips: Focus on groove and funk. Works great with house music.

genres.name: Breaks
genres.description: Breakbeat-driven electronic music with funky, syncopated rhythms
genres.mixingTips: Focus on break patterns and energy. Creative mixing opportunities.

metadata.notes: BPM ranges are typical values and may vary. Energy levels are on a 1-5 scale.
